Map127.Event[16].Page[0].list.message[0]: "They will create an idol out of our fears!"
Map127.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[0]: "Greetings sister. Have you come for the holy ceremony
Map127.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[1]: "The time is now. The times the prophecies have foretold!"
Map127.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[2]: "Greetings brother. Have you come for the holy ceremony
Map127.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[3]: "The time is now. The times the prophecies have foretold!"
Map127.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[4]: "Is there something you would like to know?"
Map127.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[6]: "Tell me which god do you serve?"
Map127.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[8]: "Where there is creation, there must be destruction. Such
Map127.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[9]: "Common folk often portray Gro-goroth as a being of evil
or an entity that must be avoided by all costs."
Map127.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[11: "Sylvian, the goddess... She once loved us so..."
Map127.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[13: "That is when lust, sex and addiction take a form of
Map127.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[14: "Alll-Mer is the most recent of all the older gods."
Map127.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[15: "But that is only because he made himself apparent at such
Map127.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[16: "He has existed for aeons as a seed of his father."
Map127.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[17: "Yes, there are countless older gods less known in these
Map127.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[18: "God of the Depths has an especially strong influence in
Map127.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[19: "The older gods have left this earth for us to suffer.
There are but traces of them left anymore."
Map127.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[20: "That is why many are turning their hopes for the new
gods. But many fail to see their path to ruin."
Map127.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[22: "The new gods offer new values. Values of greed, lust for
power, inhibition of sex and desperate seek for new
Map127.Event[16].Page[1].list.message[23: "Hm. So it is so - there is not room for all of us,
Map127.Event[16].Page[2].list.message[2]: The stone is radiating faint blue light.

Map127.Event[23].Page[0].list.message[0]: "They will create an idol out of our fears!"
Map127.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[0]: "Greetings sister. Have you come for the holy ceremony
Map127.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[1]: "The time is now. The times the prophecies have foretold!"
Map127.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[2]: "Greetings brother. Have you come for the holy ceremony
Map127.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[3]: "The time is now. The times the prophecies have foretold!"
Map127.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[4]: "I am a wretched worshipper of Alll-Mer, the ascended one,
the christ, the one who died for our sins."
Map127.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[5]: "On the empty scrolls I wrote the name of our savior -
Map127.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[6]: "As the next verse I would plead him - GIVE..."
Map127.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[7]: "As the final, third verse, I would ask for CHEESE,
LANTERN, SHORT SWORD or even a book about our christ."
Map127.Event[23].Page[1].list.message[8]: "I could ask for anything and that is exactly what I would

coming from it and burrowing underground. Seems like it's
Map127.Event[178].Page[0].list.message[3: You cut the veins open and some purple liquid seeps from
Map127.Event[178].Page[0].list.message[4: The organ stopped moving completely. This must have been
Map127.Event[178].Page[0].list.message[5: You hear faint screm-like sound echoing in the dungeon.

movement in the veins, suggesting that whatever is connected
to this thing continues to live.

Map127.Event[225].Page[0].list.message[0: "Francis, you old shit-worm. This is what you've become?"
Map127.Event[225].Page[0].list.message[2: "Tch. I got no intentions of explaining a thing to your
Map127.Event[225].Page[0].list.message[5: "If you are this far, it must mean that another cycle is to
Map127.Event[225].Page[0].list.message[7: "We are nothing but puppets. There is no real domination."
Map127.Event[225].Page[0].list.message[8: "So yes, I am ready. Proceed back in time and you will find
my younger self. Kill him and you will get what you are
Map127.Event[225].Page[0].list.message[1: "Take this key. You will need it."
"Proceed back in time and you will find my younger self.
Kill him and you will get what you are after."
"Kill him if you can that is haha!"
"Where's the fun in me explaining everything?"
"It took me numerous life cycles to understand the greater
scheme of things. Let me at least enjoy your ignorance. It's
one of the last pleasures I got left."
"I used to be quite a cocky one. Use that to your advantage."
"I've used a couple of generations to breed this magnificent
